successes.title: Homestuck Adventure Game
successes.description: An adventure game based on Homestuck, by Andrew Hussie.

Pledges.description: A digital download of the game when it's complete.
Important: for ALL reward tiers, the game and soundtrack are slated to be delivered in 2014. All other items, however, should be delivered around December 2012, in time for the holidays!
GAMEPAK1, which includes: a digital download of the game and a digital download of the game's soundtrack
GAMEPAK1 plus a Kickstarter-exclusive print signed by Andrew Hussie. (Note: Game Ships in 2014)
GAMEPAK1 plus a physical copy of the game signed by Andrew Hussie.

GAMEPAK2, which includes: a digital download of the game, a digital download of the game's soundtrack, a SIGNED physical copy of the game, and a Kickstarter-exclusive print signed by Andrew Hussie. (Note: Game Ships in 2014)

The MSPA FUNPAK, which includes: a Sburb tote bag, a God Tier t-shirt of your choice from the What Pumpkin Store, a set of 3 enamel pins, and 2 Alpha and Beta kids sticker sheets! You also get GAMEPAK1. (Note: Game Ships in 2014)
The BROPAK, which includes: a Record tote bag, a Gamebro OR Gamegrl t-shirt (your choice!), a set of 4 enamel pins, and 2 Dave/Bro sticker sheets! You also get GAMEPAK1. (Note: Game Ships in 2014)

The SLICKPAK, which includes: a Midnight Crew themed playing card deck, a Midnight Crew tote bag, a Spade t-shirt, a set of 4 enamel pins, and 2 Midnight Crew sticker sheets! You also get GAMEPAK1. (Note: Game ships in 2014)

The SEERPAK, which includes: a Homestuck-themed tarot card deck (78 cards, featuring art by 39 artists), a Grimdark Squiddle tote bag, a Prospit OR Derse t-shirt (your choice!), a set of 4 enamel pins, and 3 Prospit & Derse sticker sheets! You also get GAMEPAK1.  (Note: Game ships in 2014)
The BROPAK PRO, which is the same as the BROPAK above but you get both the Gamebro AND Gamegrl shirts! You also get an upgrade to GAMEPAK2. (Note: Game Ships in 2014)
GAMEPAK1 + SLICKPAK + MSPA FUNPAK (Note: Game ships in 2014)
GAMEPAK1 + SLICKPAK + BROPAK (Note: Game ships in 2014)
GAMEPAK1 + SEERPAK + FUNPAK (Note: Game ships in 2014)
GAMEPAK1 + SEERPAK + BROPAK (Note: Game ships in 2014)
GAMEPAK1 + SEERPAK + SLICKPAK (Note: Game ships in 2014)
GAMEPAK2 + BROPAK PRO + MSPA FUNPAK. (Note: Game Ships in 2014)

The SNOUTPAK, which includes a Senator Lemonsnout or Pyralspite Plushie (chosen at random), Troll tote bag (your choice!), Terezi Canopy t-shirt, a set of 4 enamel pins, and 2 Trolls sticker sheets! You also get GAMEPAK2. (Note: Game Ships in 2014)
GAMEPAK2 + SLICKPAK + MSPA FUNPAK + BROPAK PRO (Note: Game ships in 2014)
GAMEPAK2 + SEERPAK + SLICKPAK + BROPAK PRO (Note: Game ships in 2014)
GAMEPAK2 + SEERPAK + SLICKPAK + MSPA FUNPAK (Note: Game ships in 2014)
GAMEPAK2 + SNOUTPAK + BROPAK PRO + MSPA FUNPAK (Note: Game Ships in 2014)
GAMEPAK2 + SNOUTPAK + SLICKPAK + MSPA FUNPAK + BROPAK PRO (Note: Game ships in 2014)
GAMEPAK2 + SNOUTPAK + SEERPAK + SLICKPAK + MSPA FUNPAK + BROPAK PRO (Note: Game ships in 2014)
ALL PAKS + exclusive pack of signed game concept art and special thanks in the game credits! (Note: Game ships in 2014)

ALL PAKS + a black & white commission OR a beautiful custom Soul Portrait by Andrew Hussie - [b&w example - http://bit.ly/PSYH3n] [soul portrait example - http://bit.ly/p1qSC8] (Note: Game Ships in 2014)
